name: Eleinomae
saves: Str +4, Dex +7, Con +6, Int +5, Wis +5, Cha +7

traits.name: Unearthly Grace
traits.desc: The eleinomae's Charisma modifier is added to its armor class (included above).

traits.name: Reed Walk
traits.desc: The eleinomae can move across undergrowth or rivers without making an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain of this kind doesn't cost it extra moment.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The eleinomae's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights 3/day each: charm person, suggestion 2/day each: hallucinatory terrain, major image

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eleinomae makes three dagger attacks and one reed flower net attack.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Reed Flower Net
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws for 1 minute, and is restrained. A creature can free itself or another creature within reach from restraint by using an action to make a successful DC 15 Strength check or by doing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10).
